description: 1993 solo debut album from R. Kelly. Includes his first number-one hit, "Bump N' Grind" & follow-up hit singles: "Your Body's Callin'" & "Sex Me". This album ultimately went six times platinum! Following the success of this debut Kelly was in demand as a writer, producer & mixer, & became the most consistent hit maker in contemporary R&B music working with the likes of Aaliyah, Michael Jackson, Celine Dion, Ginuwine, Mary J. Blige, Luther Vandross, P. Diddy & others. R. Kelly has become one of modern R&B & pop music's legends.
title: 12 Play
